entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
